articles.title: Park Chan-wook Wanted More People to Appreciate His Films, So He Dropped the Sex and Violence - IndieWire
articles.description: The director explains to IndieWire how the response to his earlier films inspired "Decision to Leave," a movie that could open him up to new audiences.
articles.content:
Has Park Chan-wook gone soft?
